q: Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg has denied the government has been damaged by the row surrounding the departure of Mr Andy Coulson . Mr Andy Coulson has denied knowledge of any hacking when he was editor and Mr Nick Clegg said he had no reason to disbelieve him . Make a sliding scale starting at say 20% on bonuses of$ 2000 or more, up to say 45% for bonuses over 100K and say 75% for bonuses over one million dollars. Actual numbers would need more consideration for an even distribution. Tax all stock options at the highest value of the stock in the past 5 years so that people can't load up on tanking shares that will rebound to maybe 3X their issue value.

Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
